title: BJP MLA Abhay Verma leads East Delhi march with ‘Goli maaro saalo ko’ as mob violence continues
content:
ये लक्ष्मी नगर भाजपा का विधायक क्या कर रहा है? @AmitShah शांति बहाली के लिये सर्वदलीय मीटिंग का दिखावा करते हैं और उनके विधायक दंगा भड़काने में लगे हैं। pic.twitter.com/zxl5C90VH9— Sanjay Singh AAP (@SanjayAzadSln) February 25, 2020

Newly elected BJP MLA Abhay Verma can be seen marching through Mangal Bazaar in Laxmi Nagar as his supporters are chanting 'Goli maro' and 'Jo Hindu hit ki baat karega, wohi desh pe raj karega' and 'Jai Shri Ram'. This is in my neighbourhood.— Uday Singh Rana (@UdaySRana) February 25, 2020

Also readIn photos and videos: Day 3 of violence in Delhi as attacks against Muslims mountDelhi violence: Toll rises to 13 as rampage continues; anti-CAA protest site in Jaffrabad cleared
author: Scroll Staff
